demos.grug_text: THINK they are big brained developers many, many more, and more even definitely probably maybe not like this, many
demos.plain_english: Many developers think they are very knowledgeable, but there are actually many more who might not be as competent as they believe.

demos.grug_text: because as grug brain developer get older he forget important things, like what had for breakfast or if put pants on
demos.plain_english: "Because as Grug's brain develops and ages, he forgets important things, like what he had for breakfast or whether he put on pants."

demos.grug_text: grug brain developer not so smart, but grug brain developer program many long year and learn some things
demos.plain_english: Grug is not very smart, but he has been programming for many years and has learned some things.

prog.signature_instructions: Translate plain english to grug text
